intro_text: While out on a solo hunt, p_l notices that the water level within c_n's territory is higher than usual. {PRONOUN/p_l/subject/CAP} {VERB/p_l/know/knows} it's dangerous to continue on alone, but p_l can practically taste the prey already.
decline_text: p_l considers it for a bit, but eventually decides that it's just too risky to go any further. Perhaps {PRONOUN/p_l/subject}'ll try again later with an actual patrol.

success_outcomes.text: p_l slinks along the water's edge, avoiding wading in too far whenever {PRONOUN/p_l/subject} {VERB/p_l/do/does} enter the water. And {PRONOUN/p_l/poss} tenacity pays off! It's not the haul to end all hauls, but it'll surely be enough to fill a hungry belly or two.

p_l slinks along the water's edge, avoiding wading in too far whenever {PRONOUN/p_l/subject} {VERB/p_l/do/does} enter the water. And p_l's tenacity pays off with a catch so big that {PRONOUN/p_l/subject} almost can't haul it back to camp!

log.cats_from: from_cat saw to_cat bring back a huge haul of prey from a solo-hunt.

success_outcomes.text: A little water has never stopped p_l before, and by StarClan, {PRONOUN/p_l/subject}{VERB/p_l/'re/'s} not about to let it stop {PRONOUN/p_l/object} now! Without a second thought, p_l dives in and starts swimming, only returning to land once {PRONOUN/p_l/subject}{VERB/p_l/'ve/'s} caught an absolute feast of prey.

log.cats_from: from_cat saw to_cat bring back a huge haul of prey from a solo-hunt.

fail_outcomes.text: p_l eventually decides to continue on and... it doesn't go well. By the time p_l decides to cut {PRONOUN/p_l/poss} losses and head back to camp, {PRONOUN/p_l/subject}{VERB/p_l/'re/'s} tired, cranky, and soaked to the bone with absolutely nothing to show for it.

p_l eventually decides to continue on and... it doesn't go well. By the time {PRONOUN/p_l/subject} {VERB/p_l/decide/decides} to cut {PRONOUN/p_l/poss} losses and head back to camp, p_l's tired, cranky, and soaked to the bone with absolutely nothing to show for it. Even worse, {PRONOUN/p_l/subject} fell in earlier and now {PRONOUN/p_l/subject} can't stop hacking up water.

Pfft, what's a little extra water to a cat like p_l? Nothing, that's what! p_l swaggers on {PRONOUN/p_l/poss} way... only to slip on a patch of mud and fall into a (thankfully) shallow part of the water. Thank StarClan nobody saw that.

Pfft, what's a little extra water to a cat like p_l? Nothing, that's what! p_l swaggers on {PRONOUN/p_l/poss} way... only to slip on a patch of mud and fall into the water. {PRONOUN/p_l/subject/CAP}{VERB/p_l/'re/'s} eventually able to pull {PRONOUN/p_l/self} out of the water, but not without inhaling quite a bit.
